tags: The procurement category is Public Services category, which are open for registration. A complete conceptual paper concerning Canadian Procurement categorization regimes can be located by undertaking a web search here  and open registry catalog.
full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**

#### **Reference Number**: WS4121594500-Doc4146366238
#### **Publication Date**: October 5, 2023
#### **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023 (1400hrs EST)

This tender announcement originates from the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan). The requirement is for a Bundle of Furniture goods for the refurbishment of 15 floors at 580 Booth Street, Ottawa.

#### **Tender Details**

* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ottawa
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entities**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### **Bid Submission and Contact Information**

Bids must be submitted electronically via Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys by November 10, 2023, at 1400hrs EST. All supporting documentation must also be submitted by the tender closing date.

For more information, please contact [Christopher Finnigan](mailto:christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Important Notice:**

Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All bids submitted after 1400hrs EST on November 10, 2023, will be deemed non-responsive.

**Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17634260?extsite=MTc2MzQyNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### **Contractor Eligibility and Evaluation**

Only eligible suppliers who meet the requirements and selection criteria outlined in the Notice will be considered for evaluation. A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued against an Supply Arrangement to ensure that this project is carried out by the most qualified contractors.

I rewrote the text you provided and included only relevant and important details while ensuring clarity and concision. All key information has been maintained and easily accessible in a clean and structured markdown format. This should provide a more professional and easier-to-read piece, free of rambling and excessive information. Please let me know if you have any other requests or requirements!
